reviewText: The Final Judgement was awesome!!! Yue was cold, calculating and nothing like his alternate form, the kindhearted Yukito. Even though you get the impression that he wanted to destroy Sakura during the trials, it was more of a test to see if she deserved to be the new master of the Clow Cards. What a test, after hitting her with a barrage ice and slamming her from one part of Tokyo Tower to the next, she eventually manages to turn tide and beat the judge...yay ^_^. Sakura told Yue the she didn't want to become their master, but rather a friend, aww[...] This in turn surprises him and he accepts her as their new master. Now a new transfer student has arrived named Eroil Hiragizawa and seems very friendly with Sakura, which also makes Li extremely jealous. Sakura's brother Touya also has a new transfer student named Nakura Akizuki joining his class and she seems to have an affinity for jumping on his back and giving him great big hugs. Unknown to everyone, with the exception for Touya, these new students are going to cause major problems for our favorite Cardcaptor. I could go on and type more, but why not pick up a copy for yourself and enjoy this really cute anime from the art team of CLAMP.
summary: I love it, absolutely love it!!!

reviewText: now that the final clow card earthy is sealed sakura's quest to capturer them complete a new challenge awaits. yue has shown himself and is ready to see if sakura is worthy of being the new master of the clow.  yue first tests li and he fails and it's sakura's turn, but she can't bring herself to fight yue because is yukito her friend. she tries to use woody to bin yue, but he turn it right back at her for woody is one of the cards under his control. he then reveal to sakura that if she fails this test that her feeling for her most loved ones will be erased, and with the thought of that in her mind she finds the straight to change the wand and to cage yue using windy. now that sakura is the new master the book of clow is now the book of sakura, with trouble coming sakura must first get past her new problem the never ending rain and a key that won't turn into a wand, as well as a new presents that surprises kero.
summary: out with the old, in with the new

reviewText: This is a really cool video. I mean I like all the detail they put on this. Anyways this is about Sakura who captured the last and final card "The Earth". She is now happy and all but Julian transformed into a powerful person named Yue. Sakura did not want to defeat him sense he had his other body as Julian. Sakura had to. This was the final showdown as Sakura used one of the clow cards "The Wood" and thought that this would end but she was wrong, Yue had used his powers and turned The Wood card back to her. She thought that she was going to loose but then her teacher Mrs. Mackenzie helped her when Mrs. Mackenzie used one of her powers. (Its some kind of thing she holds in her hand but anyways) When Sakura got untangled from the vines of The Wood card Sakura hold the staff up and turned the staff into a star staff. Sakura used one of her cards "The Windy" and the card transfromed into a star card. The Windy captured Yue. Yue was now friends with Sakura and Sakura's friends. Now as Sakura turns clow cards into star cards her journey will end. (This is not in this video but after Sakura had done all this there was a transformed student from England named Eli, Sakura thought there was something strange about Eli.) Anyways this video contains three parts: Part 1, Part 2 and The Final Judgement. You will enjoy this video. (This is in english subtitle but its the best of them all)

reviewText: In Cardcaptor Sakura: Vol. 12 - Final Judgement, our young heroine has her heart broken.  Viewers' hearts will break along with her.  This DVD contains the last three episodes of the second season of the show.The first two episodes on the disc are intense, dark, and a bit violent.  Kereberos reveals to Sakura that although she has captured all of the Clow Cards, there is one final step to determine if she will be the cards' master.  Yue the Judge must arrive and make the final decision.  Who Yue really is, and what this means for Sakura, is unbearable.  Sakura must battle with Yue for her life - but how can she - when her reason to live has been taken away?The last episode gives us a glimpse of the third season.  We have a new character, a British exchange student named Eriol.  He is suave and intelligent, and seems to have taken a liking to Sakura, which agitates Li Shaoran.
